welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bockum, Germany! We are delighted to have you here in our charming city known for its historical landmarks, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and bask in the unique beauty of Bockum. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Weeze Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal buildings.
